item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0239; 05:34AM; 500 W Manchester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B3j35P; #VermontVista; *Corrected Address* LAFD arrived to find a 3,600 sq-ft commercial building erected in 1986 with heavy fire showing. Firefighters engaged in defensive operations, setting up ladder pipes and exterior hose lines, and established a "collapse zone" around the building (in case walls fell outward). There was, indeed, a collapse. Three firefighters were injured from debris that flew beyond the established collapse zone. Thankfully, two firefighters were evaluated and returned to work on the fire line. One firefighter, with a non-life threatening injury, was transported to the hospital for evaluation. It took 89 firefighters 42 minutes to extinguish the flames. LAFD Heavy Equipment is responding to assist with moving debris and locating smoldering materials underneath. The cause of the fire is under active investigation. ; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC4 CM20 CM22 E10 E15 E205 E21 E210 E215 E221 E233 E264 E266 E33 E5 E57 E64 E66 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM13 HE1 HR3 RA257 RA264 RA5 RA57 RA857 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T33 T5 T64 T66 UR5 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0982; 02:44PM; 5939 S Flower St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RHRIMe; #VermontSlauson; It took 65 firefighters 38 minutes to extinguish the flames consuming an out building to the rear of a property, which spread to a two-story church. Firefighters limited the church's damage to the eave and slight attic involvement. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E21 E215 E221 E233 E264 E57 E64 EA1 EM13 HR3 RA64 RA814 RA833 RA857 SQ21 T15 T21 T33 T64 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Update Physical Rescue; INC#0434; 09:00AM; 10500 W Sunset Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ogd4mi; #BelAir; Firefighters rapidly completed extrication and two patients were transported to a local hospital (unknown age/gender/condition/circumstances) from the scene of a traffic collision with a concrete mixing truck on its side. LAPD Inc #1230. Nothing further.; FS 71; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC9 E19 E237 E292 E71 EM9 HR3 RA37 RA71 T37 T92 UR88; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Jumper; INC#1394; 06:55PM; Vincent Thomas Bridge; MAP: https://bit.ly/3aN6y3D; #SanPedro; Sadly, one female (unknown age) plummeted to her death from the Vincent Thomas Bridge. The circumstances surround her death are unknown. MOTORISTS: Westbound lanes of the bridge will be closed for an undetermined length of time. LAPD Inc #3766, CHP Log #2177, Port PD Inc #2110. Nothing further.; FS 36; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT3 BT5 E285 E40 E48 EM13 RA38 T85; CH7; 15; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1428; 05:56PM; 525 W Manchester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ILO2Fc; #VermontKnolls; Firefighters contained the flames to just one attic in the one-story row of commercial occupancies. It took 36 LAFD firefighters 19 minutes to extinguish the flames, without injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 CM22 E15 E221 E233 E264 E266 E33 E64 EM13 RA57 SQ21 T21 T33 T64 T66; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange
